text: 13.17: Kis 1.7; 6.6; 12.5; Lo 7.6-7; Sng 105.23-24Khe Isrerin Fhe Bakɨme, ana nzan nzɨgir wora mbuiav khaŋ mbe suaŋgi, mbe anan gumgi gu mbigi ma. Maaŋ muuŋgiap, mbe won nuiana thav vov, Idzɨvan kim, ana tɨvar vhuun mbe muuŋgim, mbe guigira tavahorgi. Mbe tavahorgim, ana zumgum won ŋkasŋkar mbe ndiga Idzɨp thav zɨgi.
